about_the_game:
NOTE: This DLC only contains aesthetic content.
No "Pay to Win" and no kind of gameplay advantage content is included and never will be.

Of Guards and Thieves - Founder's Army

Want to join the Founder's Army? Get the Founder's Army Pack today and unlock a unique In-Game Badge plus a rich Skins and Avatars Collection, plus 9000 Bonus Coins instantly!

Content list:

- Exclusive Founder's Army Badge
- 9000 Bonus Coins (22.99$ value!)
- x14 Exclusive Founder's Army Profile Avatars.
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Assault
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Scout
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Carrier
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Medic
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Guardian
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Pyro
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Sniper
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Shadow
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Cobra
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Juggernaut
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Saboteur
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Merc
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Thief Medic
- Unique Founder's Army Skin for Hunter

This DLC can only be purchased once per account.
Funders Army content is exclusive and only available for Founder's Army DLC owner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
